dialogue.text: My name is Tony, I might not have lived the most … exemplary life, but a good life.
I hope you find it in your heart to forgive my decisions.

evidence:
Testimonial of Grandma Sparks
My grandchild was always a very sweet kid,
 although he sometimes hung out with a weird crowd.
 They all loved wearing all black suits and fedoras.
 He was always busy, I'm sure they had lots of fun together, 
 whatever they did. They called themselves the
 Mafia or something. He wouldn’t really talk about it.
 But one thing that my heart couldn’t bear was when
 he entered the kitchen. He never respected the food,
 by god he would break Spaghetti before boiling,
 could you imagine!

-----------------------------------
 Grandma Sparks' perfect Spaghetti recipe
-----------------------------------
Ingredients:

 1 pound (450g) spaghetti
 2 tablespoons olive oil
 4 cloves garlic, minced
 1 onion, finely chopped
 1 pound (450g) ground beef
 1 can (28 ounces) crushed tomatoes
 2 teaspoons dried oregano
 1 teaspoon dried basil
 Salt and pepper to taste
 Grated Parmesan cheese for serving
 Fresh basil leaves for garnish

 Note: If you respect your heritage and the 
 culture of food, never ever break the un-boiled 
 Spaghetti in half! Do not betray your heritage
 
 like that! Some people in our family
 
 consider food their religion!
Enjoy!
